title: Print NOD for a Transfer tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN Users have permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks print on the tx in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a menu will open where the user can choose to print a Notice of Disposition. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format.
AND The Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format.

title: As a user I want to be able to print an Advance Consent (Free Agent Election Option) letter for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has permission to print
AND is on a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New>Player Letters> Advance Consent (Free Agent Election Option)
custom_expected:
THEN PDF will generate in correct language version
AND populate Date/Name/Club with default values (can be changed by user)

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Notice to Player with 3 or more years MLS or second Outright letter for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has permissions
AND is in a Pro player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Create New>Player Letters>Notice to player with 3 or more years of MLS or a second outright letter
custom_expected:
THEN PDF will generate w/the proper info from player profile
AND Users will have the ability to alter the Current Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND Users will have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND Users will have the ability to select the "Transfer to Club" from the list of Clubs affiliated with the Player's Org.
AND Users will have the ability to enter in the Assignment Date to be populated on the form. 
AND Users will have the ability to enter in the Response Date to be populated on the form. 
AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print an Outright Form for a major/minor outright for a player with 3-5 years of MLS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Users that have permission view the form will see a "Print" button on the transaction in view or edit mode.
AND "Outright Form" will be an option when the user clicks "Print" only if the player has Super 2 Status, has a prior outright, or has 3 or more years of MLS.
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Outright Form" will check to see if the player has a prior approved major/minor outright and has less than 5.000 MLS, OR has between 3.000 and 5.000 MLS
custom_expected:
THEN If either of those situations apply, then the Notice to Player with Three Years form will print per the above documentation.
AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

custom_expected:

AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: Review nightly batch process
custom_steps:
The nightly batches sometimes do not run correctly each night.  We need to do the following:
- Make sure that we log when the overnight process starts, and when each batch starts and finishes.
- Make sure that exception handling is added to ensure that each batch runs each night - we do not want a global error to kick out the nightly process before everything runs.

title: Enhancement - As a user I want to be able to Save and Run Rule Checks on a transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN All transactions that have a "Submit" workflow should have a "Save and Run Rule Checks" button on them in preliminary.
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking this button should save any changes made to the transaction and run all on submit rules for the transaction.
custom_expected:
THEN Any relevant errors or warnings should be shown using the usual messaging, but only with a "Back" button. 
AND No submission updates will be committed and the transaction will remain in Preliminary status. 
AND If no errors/warnings are found use a blue notification saying "No errors detected"

title: Enhancement - Add transfer auto approval dates to system dates screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Transfer auto-approval exclusion" date range is a start and end date on the System Dates screen under Baseball Ops - > Minor League.
custom_expected: THEN The dates listed here drive when transfers can be auto-approved.

title: Enhancement - As a BOC user I want transfers to be auto-approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND is in a transfer tx
custom_steps: WHEN Once onSubmit rules are passed, do a flag check.
custom_expected:
THEN If the transaction has no Flags AND no comments were entered by club AND the current date is NOT between the "Transfer auto-approval exclusion start" date and "Transfer auto-approval exclusion end date", then auto-approve the transfer i.e. run on Approve rules, and update transaction status to "Approved" and run Approval updates. 
AND If transfer did not meet auto-approval criteria, or fails any on Approve rules, update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC" and show flags to BOC on Clipboard and when transaction is opened. (Example would be if there is a prior submitted transaction for the player. This would fail the on approve rules.)

title: Enhancement - As a user I want the system to generate a notification for any International player that has accumulated stats with a US based team that does not have an Immigration status entered
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player is considered an International player, and their "Immigration Status" field is blank and they accrue a day of stats for a U.S. based team (including TOR), we should generate a notification for the player's Org's MN-Contracts-Admin.
custom_expected: THEN this notification would only be generated once per Org per calendar year.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if the player I am creating a major/minor outright for is on a non-expired waiver bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an mj/mn outright tx for a player on the non-expired waiver bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the player being outrighted is on a non-expired waiver bulletin (has not yet cleared the 2 day waiver claiming period. If they are, an error will display.
custom_expected:
THEN error: "Player is currently on a pending waiver request bulletin and may not be outrighted to the minor leagues."
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Set Waivers Required for Option date
custom_steps: WHEN a Selection to ML Roster, Report Date or Sign FA transaction are approved, the Waivers Required for Option date on the profile is set.
custom_expected:
THEN The logic to set the date is: 
     - Default to 3 years from the first major league report date
     - then, for each option year the player was credited where the option year is prior to the year of the first major league report date, subtract a year
     - but, if you end up going back earlier than the first major league report date, stop there and use that date
*Note: the code is in ebis 1 at: TxPpUpdateHelper.updateWaiverOptions*

title: As a BOC user I want reversing an optional assignment to un-do any "On approve" updates that were made as a result of the transaction being approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an approved optional Assignment tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user reverses the tx
custom_expected:
THEN Set the playerâ€™s info to the prior values based on transaction history:
IF the current MJ Lg club report date was set by transaction then set to the value in history prior to transaction approval

title: Club user can accept tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a submitted tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks accept
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status is updated to approved
AND successful notification displays
AND item is reloaded in view mode
AND item is removed from Action Items

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the MN League Club's active or under control limit will be exceeded if this player is added to the originating Club's roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club's Active/Under Control Limit will be exceeded
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks accept/submit
custom_expected:
THEN show error: The club [Club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
AND tx will be flagged

title: As a Club user I want to receive an error if I'm attempting to accept or reject a Rule 6 Return Process with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has the assignment date after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks accept or submit
custom_expected: THEN show error: This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date

title: As a user I want to be prompted to create an addendum C if the player I am attempting to transfer requires one for the level of play the player will return to
custom_preconds:
GIVEN player does NOT have an addendum C
AND the tx date is either bet. 3/15 and End of MJ League season
OR Between End of Rule 5 Draft and before 3/15
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks accept
custom_expected:
THEN show error: "Player is missing a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play."
OR "Player does not yet have a salary in his Addendum C for his new level of play. Please ensure one is created before the start of the next season."
AND User can ignore and continue

title: As a Club user I want rejecting a rule 6 return process transaction to automatically submit a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a submitted Rule 6 Return Process tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the tx
custom_expected:
THEN System automatically submits a Return of Rule 5 Selection tx
AND approvals item is generated for BOC
AND an entry is created in Player History and follows the proper format

title: Rule 6 Return Process Permissions - Club - Major Transactions
custom_expected:
BASIC:
Club users with this role can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.
Exceptions:
1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
2. They cannot edit or change these transactions (Basic only)
3. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field
Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

ADMIN:
Club users with this role can view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transactions. It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the transaction. It also does not matter which Org the involved player currently belongs too.
 Exceptions:
1. No Transactions that are in Suppressed state
2. They cannot see "BOC Notes" field
Club users with this role Can view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only transactions with the following exceptions:
1.  Cannot see BOC Notes field for any transaction
2. Cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org. Note that even if the player involved is currently part of their Org, they still cannot see the comments field unless they are the From Org or To Org
3. Attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
Can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Majnor League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org".

title: As a Club user I want accepting a rule 6 return process transaction to automatically submit a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a Rule 6 Return process tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user accepts the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system automatically creates and submits a Return of Rule 5 Selection tx
AND approvals item is created
AND player's pending Major League roster status is Null
AND Player's Minor League roster status is Active
AND Player's pending ORG/Club are set to org/club player was selected from in R5 draft
AND Player History is updated in proper format

title: As a user I want to receive a notification if no decision has been entered for a Rule 6 Return Process transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has not received a decision for their Rule 6 Return Process tx
custom_steps: WHEN User runs the nightly notification batch
custom_expected:
THEN the system will check to see if any Rule 6 Return Process transactions have not yet been accepted or rejected with an Expiration Date and time in the past.  
IF a Rule 6 Return is found that meets the above criteria, then the following notification is generated for the BOC MJ Assignments Admin as well as the Receiving Club's MJ Assignments Admin user (The one the player was drafted FROM): "Rule 5 Tender Reminder.  The club, [club], has not accepted or rejected the Rule 6 Return Process for [player name]."

title: Update to new descriptions As a Club user I want to receive a notification when my Rule 6 Return Process transaction is accepted or rejected
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a pending tx
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is accepted or rejected
custom_expected:
THEN Initiating Club (or the Club that the player belongs to) will receive a notification when the transaction is Accepted.
AND Initiating Club (or the Club that the player belongs to) will receive a notification when the transaction is Rejected. 
AND "Description" will be a hyperlink and will say "Accepted" or "Rejected" instead of just "Approved" for both. 
AND Clicking on the description hyperlink of any of these notifications will open the transaction in view mode in the same window/tab. 
AND Player's name will be a hyperlink.
AND Clicking on the player's name hyperlink of any of these notifications will open the player's profile in view mode in the same window/tab on the Player History tab.

title: As a BOC user I want to receive an error if I'm attempting to approve a Return of Rule 5 Selection with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an assignment date after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected: THEN show error: This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date

title: As a user I want to receive an error if I have back or futuredated my return of Rule 5 selection's assignment date more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has an assignment date back/future dated more than 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected: THEN show error: Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission.

title: As a BOC user I want to receive an error if the player I am approving a Return of Rule 5 Seelction for has an approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a pending/approved tx after the assignment date
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected: THEN show error: A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>.

title: As a BOC user I want to approve a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction (Accepted)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an accepted tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system will run rule checks
AND Successful notification will display
AND Item is removed from clipboard
AND Player History is updated
AND Notification is sent to initiating club
AND Daily tx bulletin entry is created
AND Set org to org and Club being returned to (the org from which the player was selected)
AND Set level of play to the level in which the player is being returned
AND Set Highest Level of Play to the Level of the Club being returned to if it is higher than current level
AND Set Mj roster status to null
AND Set Mn roster status to Active
AND Set prior outright flag to 1
AND Set prior outright date to the date of the R5 Return
AND Set Current Mj Lg Acquisition Org to null
AND Set Current Mj Lg Club Report Date to null
AND Set Current Mj Lg Acquisition Date to null
AND Set Current Club Acquired From to null
AND Set Option Waiver Effective Flag to 0
AND Set Option Waiver Effective Date to null
AND Set Outright Waiver Effective Flag to 0
AND Set Outright Waiver Effective Date to null
AND Set Trade Waiver Effective Flag to 0
AND Set Trade Waiver Effective Date to null
AND Set Mn Lg Last Club to club being returned to
AND Set Mn Lg Last Year Played to the year of the Rule 5 Return
IF R5 Desel = ‘S’,
     * Set R5 Desel to null
AND Set R5 Desel Year to 0

title: Recalculate player's CBT impact on approval of Return of Rule 5 Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has approved the tx
custom_expected: THEN CBT impact is recalculated

title: As a BOC user I want to approve a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction (Rejected)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a rejected tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND tx is updated to approved
AND Successful notification displays
AND Item is removed from clipboard
AND Player History is updated
AND Notification is sent to initiating club
AND Daily tx bulletin entry is created
AND Set R5 DeselLk to null
AND Set R5 DeselYear to 0

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reject a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a submitted Return of Rule 5 Selection tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND Status is updated to rejected and deleted
AND successful notification displays
AND user is taken to rule 6 return process tx
AND approvals item disappears from clipboard
AND Set pending Major League and minor league roster status to value in history prior to transaction submission
AND Player History Entry is removed
AND Update Transaction status of associated "Rule 6 Return Process" to "Rejected"
AND Notification is sent to initiating club

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reverse a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an approved tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks reverse
OR Reverse and suppress
custom_expected:
THEN system checks if it the latest approved tx
AND status is updated to reversed/suppressed
AND the associated Rule 6 Return Process tx will be reversed
AND on approve updates are reversed
AND Notification is sent to club for both txs
IF also suppressed then both tx disappear from Player History, Daily tx bulletin and searches

title: As a BOC User I want to Approve/Reject Return of R5 Selection transaction from the Clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a pending tx on their clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN Checking off a Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction in the Approvals clipboard will enable the Approve and Reject buttons.
custom_expected: THEN Clicking Approve or Reject will work the same as if they had been clicked from the transaction.

title: As a BOC user I want reversing an optional assignment to un-do any "On approve" updates that were made as a result of the transaction being approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an approved optional assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks reverse
custom_expected:
THEN Set the playerâ€™s info to the prior values based on transaction history:
IF the current MJ Lg club report date was set by transaction then set to the value in history prior to transaction approval

title: BOC user can approve a player's declare free agent transaction to update their Rule 5 information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Approving a declare free agent transaction for a minor league player
custom_expected:
THEN set the player’s Rule 5 Draft Excluded/Selected flag to null
AND The player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year is set to 0.
BUT if Reversed Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible back to its previous value. 
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year back to its previous value.

title: BOC user can approve a player's release to update their Rule 5 information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Approving a release for a minor league player
custom_expected:
THEN the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible is set to null.
AND The player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year is set to 0.
BUT when reversed  Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible back to its previous value. 
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year back to its previous value

title: BOC user can approve a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction to update the player's Rule 5 information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Approving a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction
custom_expected:
THEN Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible to null.
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year to 0
BUT when reversed Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible back to its previous value. 
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year back to its previous value

title: BOC user can approve an elect free agency transaction to update the player's Rule 5 information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Approving an elect free agency transaction
custom_expected:
THEN Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible to null.
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year to 0
BUT when reversed Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible back to its previous value. 
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year back to its previous value

title: User will receive an error if the player has an active SEL flag set (option)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player a Club is attempting to option has an active SEL flag set.
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "Player was selected in the Rule 5 draft and must be tendered back to the club from which he was selected."

title: BOC user can approve a player's major/minor outright to update their Rule 5 information
custom_preconds: GIVEN As a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN Approving a major/minor outright for a major league player
AND If player’s R5 DESEL = ‘D
custom_expected:
THEN Set R5 DESEL to null
AND Set R5 DESEL year to 0
BUT if reversed Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible back to its previous value. 
AND Set the player’s Rule 5 designated eligible year back to its previous value

title: User will receive an error if the player has an active SEL flag set (outright)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player a Club is attempting to conduct an outright for has an active SEL flag set
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "Player was selected in the Rule 5 draft and must be tendered back to the club from which he was selected."

title: Error if a player has a major/minor outright for is Rule 5 excluded and it is more than 20 days prior to the start of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the player is a Rule 5 draft excluded player.
AND If yes, then if the assignment date is more than 20 days before Club System Date: First Day of Season of Major League Club.
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "Player is a Rule 5 draft excluded player and may not be outrighted or optioned until 20 days before opening day."

title: BOC user can approve a player's selection to ML roster to update their Rule 5 information
custom_preconds: GIVEN as a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN Approving a selection to major league roster for a minor league player
AND if the transaction date is after the cutoff to avoid draft exclusion date or the transaction date is before the MJ/Mn reserve list date
custom_expected:
THEN Set the player’s R5 DESEL value to ‘D’
AND Set the player’s R5 DESEL year to the year of the transaction date + 1
